channel.title: Adding thiev stalls [delta]
channel.description:
Hello, Im having trouble adding my thief stalls I have my thief stalls in the game as objects in the makeglobalobject part but I try thieving from them and it doesn't work so I tried a lot of stuff and it's not working. I just want to know how to add so it gives a certain amount of money or a certain level for thieving from it.
If you can help me thanks
-Kevin

item.title: Adding thiev stalls [delta]
item.dc:creator: @preepsha3 preepsha3
item.description:
@preepsha3 wrote:

[size=14pt]Thanks you soo much but how do I change the level for the thieving stall?[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Adding thiev stalls [delta]
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

Simple i love Delta to Start so here it is Folow Carefully.

First Find This in Client.Java

if(objectID == 2561){
If You Dont Find it then Search With out the Numbers.....

Under THat Add this

TheifStall("Stall Name", "and recieve a 100k", 1, 75*playerLevel[17], 995, 100000, 0x340); }

Here is A snippet Of mine…

if(objectID == 2561){ TheifStall("cake stall", "and recieve a baked cake", 1, 75*playerLevel[17], 1891, 1, 0x340); } if(objectID == 4876){ TheifStall("General Stall", "and recieve 100k", 1, 50*playerLevel[17], 995, 100000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 4875){ TheifStall("Food Stall", "and recieve 40k", 1, 15*playerLevel[17], 995, 40000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 4874){ TheifStall("Crafting Stall", "and recieve 5k", 1, 1*playerLevel[17], 995, 5000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 4877){ TheifStall("Magic Stall", "and recieve 150k", 1, 80*playerLevel[17], 995, 150000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 4878){ TheifStall("Scimitar Stall", "and recieve 300k", 1, 90*playerLevel[17], 995, 300000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2562){ TheifStall("gem stall", "and recieve 250k", 80, 7500*playerLevel[17], 995, 250000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2560){ TheifStall("silk stall", "and recieve 150k", 1, 500*playerLevel[17], 995, 150000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2565){ TheifStall("silver stall", "and recieve 40k", 50, 1500*playerLevel[17], 995, 40000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 4708){ TheifStall("vegetable stall", "and recieve a tomatoe", 6000, 35*playerLevel[17], 1982, 1, 0x340); }

Read full topic
